Reviews.Title: The Best What I Need.
Reviews.Author: Hussain
Reviews.Content: This phone was the phone I was looking for after losing my Iphone , and now I have the phone which suits with my car colour . its all black and the phone too , I have ordered car charger but now I am looking for desktop charger black but I couldn't find it ..

Reviews.Title: Mrs
Reviews.Author: Juju "judlaure"
Reviews.Content: I've had my Nokia 6300 for a week. I am pretty satisfied with it. For me the battery last for three days since I make about 6 phone calls each days. The screen is large and the quality of image very clean. Overall, I like this phone and would recommend it to those interested in a simple and reliable phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: I was given this phone by my company. I have a Nokia 6682 myself and I thought I was going to miss all the features in the 6682 but I was surprised that this phone not only has the same features enhanced but radio is great. The camera is better. The only thing is that I would have liked to keep a previous ring tone from my other phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
U.S. version tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and EDGE data capabilities
Candybar phone with compact modern design; 2-megapixel camera /camcorder with 8x digital zoom; digital media player; FM radio
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; MicroSD memory expansion to 2 GB; organizer; access to email
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 336 hours (14 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 6300 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera - U.S. Version with Warranty (Black)
